author: jwasinger
content: I posted a new EIP for EVMMAX:  https://ethereum-magicians.org/t/eip-6601-evm-modular-arithmetic-extensions-evmmax .  would be great to get feedback on the new design to see if/how we want to proceed.

author: jwasinger
content: I don't yet have a full implementation of the EIP.  But 6601 removes some overhead from the arithmetic opcodes compared to its predecessor (eip 5843).  so we can expect that it will be measurably faster than the benchmarks given for 5843.
